name: Fireman (Gameboy Color)
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color (only). A game by: László Rajcsányi -  Wilds, 2021. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0-beta5 by Chris Maltby! This game is an entry for the Gameboy Competition 2021. (https://itch.io/jam/gbcompo21)

Original Story:

A fire broke out in New York City! It is your job to stop the spread of fire and protect the city from destruction. Good luck!

The game is a success for everyone, but the question is how fast you were. The faster you finish, the more points you get.

The creator of this game, scored 122 points. This is my best result.
Does anyone know better? :)

Controls on original machine:

Start the game: Start
Move: Cursor Keys (Left - Right)
Jump: B
Accept: A

Controls in the browser:

Start the game: Enter
Move: Arrow Keys (Left - Right)
Jump: X
Accept: Z
